page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: When we looked at the different types of jobs done by people in our area we found that there was a great variety. The reason for this is because there is not one major employer within a 5 mile radius of Pelsall.As we have seen already most people travel out of Pelsall to quite a number of local destinations. Quite a large number of people are retired and a substantial percentage of ladies are housewives. In fact we found that out of 125 people surveyed there were 41 different jobs represented. Here is a list of the ten most popular:Engineers,School Cleaners, Office Workers, Leather Workers, Joiners,Drivers,Shop Assistants, Stockman,Electricians and Secretaries.
